external_games.name: Bakusou Dekotora Densetsu 2: Otoko Jinsei Yume Ichiro

name: Bakusou Dekotora Densetsu 2: Otoko Jinsei Yume Ichiro
summary: Released alongside "Art Camion: Geijutsuden" on the same day, "Bakusou Dokotora Densetsu 2 - Otoko Jinsei Yume Ichiro" is generally seen as the proper 2nd installment of the series. This sequel introduces numerous changes to modes and gameplay, accompanied by an entirely new soundtrack and enhanced graphics quality.
